text: The Eriophyidae or gall mites are a family of mites. They are plant parasites and produce galls.Storch, Volker & Welsch, Ulrich 1997. Systematische Zoologie. Fischer. The mites can cause severe damage to the host plant. They have only two pairs of legs and are very small, 0.08 mm - 0.3 mm.FÃ¼ller, Horst et al 1994. Urania Tierreich - Wirbellose Tiere 2. Leipzig & Jena: Urania- Verlag, 70 & 88\. The gut is straight, there are no outgrowths of the gut. They have no heart or circulatory system. == Some genera == There about 270 genera and over 3000 species.Zhang, Z.-Q. (ed) 2013. Animal biodiversity: an outline of higher-level classification and survey of taxonomic richness. Addenda, p129.
